page.title: 06Mr. Bullimore's Memories.
page.content: {Alfred Bullimore}came to our Coffee Morning. Mr. Bullimore is 81 and he was born in Seaton Delaval. He has lived in Newcastle and in London. Before he left the area, he used to work in Seaton Delaval colliery. He worked with the{pit ponies.}The ponies were used below ground to pull the tubs full of coal to the bottom of the shaft. When he returned to Seaton Delaval he worked as the lamp lighter. The lamps used gas. He told us of a game called{potchey. You make a hole in the ground and everyone has to roll marbles into the hole. The person who is 'on' has to try to stop the marbles from going in the hole. Those that he stops he can keep for himself.
